entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers and drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
